price: (12) [They will say], "Our Lord, remove from us the torment; indeed, we are believers."
arabic: رَّبَّنَا ٱكۡشِفۡ عَنَّا ٱلۡعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: rabbanā ik'shif ʿannā al-ʿadhāba innā mu'minūna
